column4: The VirtualBox Linux kernel driver (vboxdrv) is either not loaded or there is a permission problem with /dev/vboxdrv. any suggestions please.
how did you install vbox and which one?
i have installed from ubuntu software centre
since the install, did you reboot? dont reboot if you have not
i installed windows xp and woks fine. after ubuntu  update showing like this issue.
did the update include a kernel update?
couple of things, in terminal 'sudo apt-get install dkms' , if it says already installed then bug out
in terminal 'sudo /etc/init.d/vboxdrv' , does it complete without error?
why are there colon(:) on your response line? those where not on terminal were they?
ttp://askubuntu.com/questions/126175/virtualbox-doesnt-load-after-12-04-upgrade  i followed this page. issue solved thank you almoxarife.
